name: Defender_Ranged.Energy_Blast
display_help: Energy Blast allows you to hurl bolts of energy at your foes, and can often send them flying with Knockback.

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Energy_Blast.Power_Bolt
powers.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 20.00% chance for 1.5 magnitude knock on target
20.00% chance for 1.5 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Energy_Blast.Power_Blast
powers.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 30.00% chance for 2.1 magnitude knock on target
30.00% chance for 2.1 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Energy_Blast.Energy_Torrent
powers.display_help: Energy Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 45° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 60.00% chance for 6.2 magnitude knock on target
60.00% chance for 6.2 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Energy_Blast.Power_Burst
powers.display_help: A devastating attack, Power Burst unleashes a massive amount of energy dealing very high damage at short distances. The impact from this burst often knocks back most foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 60.00% chance for 4.2 magnitude knock on target
60.00% chance for 4.2 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Energy_Blast.Sniper_Blast
powers.display_help: A focused blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Energy_Blast.Aim
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

display_info: 50.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Energy_Blast.Power_Push
powers.display_help: This ranged attack deals little damage, but sends the target flying for a great distance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged Minor DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe High Knockback

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Energy_Blast.Explosive_Blast
powers.display_help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

display_info: 50.00% chance for 4.2 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 4.2 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Energy_Blast.Nova
powers.display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals extreme Energy and Smashing damage to all nearby foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
